overview: Surrounded by people he loves yet unable to feel loved, a self proclaimed teen loner struggles with negative intrusive thoughts and troubling dreams leaking into his already paranoid life. Eventually he starts to struggle with finding the next step forwards and figuring out what's best for his own mental and physical well being. He begins this process of finding himself again by expressing his problems in an increasingly obscure series of experimental artworks.
title: Entertain The Thought
